description: Convert .lu file(s) into LUIS JSON file. You can optionally also request LUIS batch test input file

options.lu_folder: [Optional] Folder that has the .lu file. By default ludown will only look at the current folder. To look at all subfolders, include -s.
options.out_folder: [Optional] Output folder for all files the tool will generate.
options.subfolder: [Optional] Include sub-folders as well when looking for .lu files.
options.skip_header: [Optional] Generate .lu file without the header comment
options.write_luis_batch_tests: [Optional] Write out LUIS batch test json file.
options.out: [Optional] Output file name for the LUIS model.
